definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Eric understands that regardless of whose fault it was, he should not make any further investigation.
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威當明白不論口臭王是誰也不宜追究。

sentences.english: Garfield: Show me a good mouser , and I'll show you a cat with bad breath.
sentences.chinese: 給我一隻抓耗子的貓，我就讓你見識一下他的口臭。

sentences.english: Hi, Jack, what leo will you take this semester?
sentences.chinese: 你好，傑克，這學期你選治口臭偏方什麼課？

sentences.english: Because smoking gives you bad breath, yellow teeth and affects the health of hair.
sentences.chinese: 吸菸會導致口臭，牙齒變黃，影響頭髮的健康。

sentences.english: Just remember that the plaque between your teeth can cause bad breath as well.
sentences.chinese: 一定要記住牙之間的蝕斑也能引起口臭。

sentences.english: Have cure to infect model the medicine of halitosis ?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有治療傳染型口臭的藥？

sentences.english: It prevents tooth decay and cures bad breath.
sentences.chinese: 綠茶能防止蛀牙，治癒口臭。

sentences.english: Mayo experts offer these tips to help prevent it
sentences.chinese: 梅奧門診的專家們提出以下幾種防止口臭的方法。

sentences.english: Strong halitosis be but one of my feminine traits.
sentences.chinese: 猛烈的口臭是重要的女性特徵。

sentences.english: The smell of purulent sputum incubating deep within a lung may waft its way up the bronchial tree, resulting in serious halitosis.
sentences.chinese: 肺中的濃痰的氣味沿着支氣管呼出來導致嚴重的口臭。

sentences.english: Used to remove halitosis and onion and garlic flavor, clear the other tone.
sentences.chinese: 用來除口臭和蔥蒜味，另口氣清晰。

sentences.english: Stubborn stains, yellowing teeth will turn black and produce the phenomenon of bad breath.
sentences.chinese: 頑固污漬，會令牙齒變黃變黑，併產生口臭現象。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, positive BANA tests are statistically associated with halitosis .
sentences.chinese: 難怪BANA陽性反應與口臭會有統計關聯性。

sentences.english: Watercress is another great way to battle bad breath, according to McKeith.
sentences.chinese: 據麥基斯稱，水田芥是另一種消除口臭的好方法。

sentences.english: Show me a good mouser, and I'll show you a cat with bad breath.
